OrgName.entry: PRIOR BANK HOUSE RESIDENTIAL CARE HOME

Desc.entry: Voluntary sector residential care home for older people aged 65 years and over, which is run by the Anchor Trust. 32 beds. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ContactName.entry: Tracey Rose, Registered Manager/Gillian Taylor, Administrator

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
